tbTextArea component in tubular.directives

The tbTextArea component represents a textarea field. Similar to tbSimpleEditor but with a textarea HTML element instead of input.

It uses the TubularModel to retrieve column or field information.

Component's attributes

Param Type Details
name string

Set the field name.
value object

Set the value.
isEditing boolean

Indicate if the field is showing editor.
showLabel boolean

Set if the label should be display.
label string

Set the field's label otherwise the name is used.
placeholder string

Set the placeholder text.
help string

Set the help text.
required boolean

Set if the field is required.
readOnly boolean

Set if the field is read-only.
min number

Set the minimum characters.
max number

Set the maximum characters.
